title: Blended Inquiry Learning for Proportional Reasoning and Early Algebraic Thinking Expansion

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: A customized mathematical thinking training program for adult learners, offering proportional reasoning problem-solving environments similar to real-life scenarios via VR simulations

learning_goals: Can model everyday problems using proportional relationships (ratios, proportional comparisons)
Can explain proportional reasoning processes using visual representations (tables, graphs, physical simulations)
Can generalize patterns discovered during problem-solving as algebraic expressions (using variables)
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
